text: Charles Allan Rich was an American country music singer, songwriter, and musician. 1960 was the first time he had a song on Billboard Hot 100 music chart. == Background == Rich was born and raised in Arkansas, United States, to rural cotton farmers. He attended Consolidated High School in Forrest City. ==Biography== He was born on December 14, 1932 in Colt, Arkansas.
